mapper.select: SELECT /* COGCntsMapper.getCntsListCnt */ count(*) FROM CO_CNTS_MST WHERE MENU_SEQ = #{menuSeq}

select /* COGCntsMapper.selectCntsList */ menu_seq , SEQ , VER , CNTS , JS_CNTS , PRCS_CD , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = #{regId}) AS REG_NM , REG_DTM from CO_CNTS_MST order by reg_dtm desc
SELECT /* COSeqMapper.selectSeqNum */ NEXT_ID FROM CO_SEQ_MST WHERE TABLE_NM = #{tableNm}
mapper.update: UPDATE CO_SEQ_MST /*COGCntsMapper.updateCntsSeq*/ SET NEXT_ID = (SELECT * FROM (SELECT NEXT_ID + '1' FROM CO_SEQ_MST WHERE TABLE_NM = #{tableNm}) tmp) WHERE TABLE_NM = #{tableNm}
mapper.select: SELECT /* COGCntsMapper.selectCntsDtl */ SEQ , MENU_SEQ , CNTS , JS_CNTS , PRCS_CD , REG_ID , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , MOD_DTM FROM CO_CNTS_MST WHERE MENU_SEQ = #{menuSeq} AND SEQ = #{detailsKey}
